member.name: NMCBEDRAGBEGINA
member.summary: Contains information used with the CBEN_DRAGBEGIN notification code.

member.name: NMCBEDRAGBEGINA.hdr
member.summary: An structure that contains information about the notification code.

member.name: NMCBEDRAGBEGINA.iItemid
member.summary: The zero-based index of the item being dragged. This value will always be -1, indicating that the item being dragged is the item displayed in the edit portion of the control.

member.name: NMCBEDRAGBEGINA.szText
member.summary: The character buffer that contains the text of the item being dragged.
